types.section:
{{fr-noun|m|-}}

# {{lb|fr|arts}} an [[artistic]] [[style]] involving [[endless]] [[depth]] of [[blackness]], created by playing with the light reflected off the [[texture]] of the [[paint]], and associated with the works of {{w|Pierre Soulages}}
types.html:
outrenoir m (uncountable)

  1. (art) an artistic style involving endless depth of blackness, created by playing with the light reflected off the texture of the paint, and associated with the works of Pierre Soulages
trans: an artistic style involving endless depth of blackness, created by playing with the light reflected off the texture of the paint, and associated with the works of Pierre Soulages
